These are from the North Carolina Home Educators:

FOLLOW UP CONTACTS:

CBS Evening News: evening@c...
Viewer comment lines: (212) 975-3247 or (212) 975-4321
"Eye On America" Story Date: October 13, 2003
Correspondent: Vince Gonzales
Producer: Barbara Pierce

North Carolinians for Home Education
(919) 790-1100 or http://nche.com
President Hal Young president@n...

See the page of links at http://nche.com***

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/15/03 7:36:19 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
jana@... writes:
> I also told CBS that I would be boycotting the advertisers of the show and
> I'll be telling the advertisers that....hell...I may boycott CBS! Perhaps we
> could go to the petition site - circulate it and send it to CBS. We could
> demand that they present the real facts of homeschooling.


I would be happy to sign a petition and to write to the advertisers -- does
anyone have specific information on these? (I didn't watch the CBS news so I
don't know which companies advertised, and I'm not sure what the petition site
is.)

Thanks,
Amy

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: CBS News Report: NCHE press  release on this ...
messages.msgSnippet: Politics is all around us, and there isn t any we who can take the power back if individuals can t keep it and use it wisely on their own. Kinda like the
messages.messageBody:
Politics is all around us, and there isn't any "we" who can "take the
power back" if individuals can't keep it and use it wisely on their own. Kinda
like the Wizard of Oz and the search for home -- if you are looking for the
political power of independence, don't look anywhere other than your own
backyard because if it isn't there, you never really lost it in the first place. You
just didn't realize you had it already. :) JJ

jana@... writes:


>
> I swear - this is becoming more & more a police state. We really need to
> take the power back - we need to get out and vote these jackasses out of office.
> I know that many of these folks aren't elected - but if we get the greedy,
> manipulative jerks out - the others will lose much of their power.
>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
